SENT.plain: Case-report of neonatal Marfan Syndrome with at birth the following observations: arachnodactyly, excessive length of arm, cardiac anomalies with hemodynamic troubles leading to death within 4 days
Anatomical data of the postmortem examination and histologic anomalies of the aorta confirm the diagnosis
No case of Marfan syndrome are to be found among forebearers
These characteristics underline the rarity, the gravity of the pronostic and the often sporadic appearance of the Marfan syndrome when revelated in the neonatal period
